TopicTitle: Icons in tracking station obstructed by celestial bodies

Articles.Content:
KSP version: 0.1.1.0.21572

Icons in the tracking station become more obstructed by a celestial body the closer you zoom into a celestial body. This makes it hard to see where crafts, etc. are in the tracking station.

OS: Windows 10 Pro, Version 22H2
CPU: Intel Core i7-7820X @ 3.60GHz, 8 cores
RAM: 32GB DDR4
GPU: 8GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6600
GPU driver: 23.2.2
Screen Resolution: 1920x1080
And its the opposite when you're flying a ship. The icons block the celestial bodies
